alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 2:58PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, San Bernardino. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 255 PM PDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain with vehicles becoming stuck in washes in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cima, Baker, Kelso, Cima Road, Kingston Mine Road, Kelbaker Road, Kelso Cima Road, and Morning Star Mine Road - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
